DataSource.Query: SELECT transactions.inventory_transfer_requests.inventory_transfer_request_id, transactions.inventory_transfer_requests.transaction_ts, transactions.inventory_transfer_requests.value_date, office.users.user_name AS entered_by, core.verification_statuses.verification_status_name AS status, verified_by_user.user_name AS verified_by, transactions.inventory_transfer_requests.authorization_reason, transactions.inventory_transfer_requests.received, received_by_user.user_name AS received_by, transactions.inventory_transfer_requests.received_on, transactions.inventory_transfer_requests.delivered, delivered_by_user.user_name AS delivered_by, transactions.inventory_transfer_requests.delivered_on, office.offices.office_name, transactions.inventory_transfer_requests.reference_number, transactions.inventory_transfer_requests.statement_reference, office.stores.store_name FROM transactions.inventory_transfer_requests INNER JOIN office.offices ON transactions.inventory_transfer_requests.office_id = office.offices.office_id INNER JOIN office.users ON transactions.inventory_transfer_requests.user_id = office.users.user_id INNER JOIN office.stores ON transactions.inventory_transfer_requests.store_id = office.stores.store_id INNER JOIN core.verification_statuses ON transactions.inventory_transfer_requests.authorization_status_id = core.verification_statuses.verification_status_id LEFT JOIN office.users AS verified_by_user ON transactions.inventory_transfer_requests.authorized_by_user_id = verified_by_user.user_id LEFT JOIN office.users AS received_by_user ON transactions.inventory_transfer_requests.received_by_user_id = received_by_user.user_id LEFT JOIN office.users AS delivered_by_user ON transactions.inventory_transfer_requests.delivered_by_user_id = delivered_by_user.user_id WHERE transactions.inventory_transfer_requests.inventory_transfer_request_id=@id;

SELECT office.stores.store_code || ' (' || office.stores.store_name || ')' AS store, core.items.item_code, core.items.item_name, transactions.inventory_transfer_request_details.quantity, core.units.unit_name FROM transactions.inventory_transfer_request_details INNER JOIN transactions.inventory_transfer_requests ON transactions.inventory_transfer_request_details.inventory_transfer_request_id = transactions.inventory_transfer_requests.inventory_transfer_request_id INNER JOIN core.items ON transactions.inventory_transfer_request_details.item_id = core.items.item_id INNER JOIN core.units ON transactions.inventory_transfer_request_details.unit_id = core.units.unit_id INNER JOIN office.stores ON transactions.inventory_transfer_requests.store_id = office.stores.store_id WHERE transactions.inventory_transfer_requests.inventory_transfer_request_id = @id ORDER BY transactions.inventory_transfer_requests.inventory_transfer_request_id;
